markdownRemark.html: Located behind one of the best beaches in Marbella Los Monteros / Costa Bella. Marbella Golf offers good quality golf for golfers of all capabilities. Greens, fairways, bunkers, tee - boxes are all well maintained. The club is small, but cozy, intimate and with very friendly and attentive staff. The view from the balcony is beautiful, especially during sunset.

frontmatter.title: Marbella Golf Country Club
frontmatter.description: Marbella Golf Country Club - Located behind one of the best beaches in Marbella Los Monteros / Costa Bella. Marbella Golf offers good quality golf for golfers of all capabilities. Greens, fairways, bunkers, tee - boxes are all well maintained. The club is small, but cozy, intimate and with very friendly and attentive staff. The view from the balcony is beautiful, especially during sunset.
frontmatter.address: Ctra de Cádiz, N-340 Km 188, 29604, Marbella, Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 110.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 110.00 euros
tags: Top golf courses Costa del Sol
